TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit GridItemPattern/GridItemPatternInformation extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 使用 物件的 或 存取子，提供該物件的屬性值存取。

span.span: Provides access to the property values of a object using its or accessors.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Column As Integer
public: property int Column { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得包含儲存格或項目之資料行的序號 (Ordinal Number)。

span.span: Gets the ordinal number of the column that contains the cell or item.

value.span: 以零起始的序號，識別包含儲存格或項目的資料行。

span.span: A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the column containing the cell or item.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下列範例中，接聽程式會宣告為追蹤的方格容器內的格線項周遊。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. 項目屬性會回應至主控台，在每個焦點變更事件時。Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus-changed event. public: property int ColumnSpan { int get(); };

summary.span: 取得儲存格或項目合併的資料行數目。

span.span: Gets the number of columns spanned by a cell or item.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下列範例中，接聽程式會宣告為追蹤的方格容器內的格線項周遊。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. 項目屬性會回應至主控台，在每個焦點變更事件時。Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus-changed event. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainingGrid As AutomationElement

summary.span: 取得支援 及表示儲存格或項目之容器的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目。

span.span: Gets a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element that supports and represents the container of the cell or item.

value.span: 此 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]項目支援 GridPattern 並表示資料表儲存格或項目容器。

span.span: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element that supports the GridPattern and represents the table cell or item container.

value.span: 預設值是 null 參考 (在 Microsoft Visual Basic.NET)。

span.span: The default is a null reference ( in Microsoft Visual Basic .NET).

remarks.format: ## Examples 在下列範例中，接聽程式會宣告為追蹤的方格容器內的格線項周遊。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. 項目屬性會回應至主控台，在每個焦點變更事件時。Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus-changed event.
